timeline.bodyText: Looks like you're only supporting one listener at a time, I wonder if we want to allow multiple listeners, otherwise it may be surprising to clients that their listener is removed just because someone else registered a listener as well.
timeline.author: vkryachko

timeline.bodyText: Should there be a way to "unregister" the listener? A common way to do it is to have the register method return a "registration" object, that has a remove() method.
